message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DM, cs.GR, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with geometric and combinatorial properties of simplicial meshes, which are commonly studied in computational geometry (cs.CG) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The paper also involves the study of vertex links and local combinatorial structures, which are relevant to graph theory (cs.GR) and numerical analysis (cs.NA). Finally, the paper discusses conditions for well-centeredness, which is a topic in computational geometry and topology (cs.SI).
